trans-unit.source: Enables clients to provide custom services to components on which the contract is implemented.
A component implements <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> to enable clients to offer services to the component.
After a service has been offered to a component, other clients of the component can access the service.
Components typically implement <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> on the same type on which they implement <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>.

Clients use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.ProfferService%2A> method to add an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> to the set of service providers offered by a component.

Clients use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.RevokeService%2A> method to remove an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> from the set of service providers offered by a component.
Adds a service to the set of services that can be accessed by clients of a component.
The format of the `serviceIdentifier` parameter is defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> implementation.
A uniform resource identifier (URI) is the recommended identifier.
A string that identifies the service being offered.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract"></xref> that implements the service being offered.
Removes a service from the set of services offered by a component.
The format of the `serviceIdentifier` parameter is defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract> implementation.
A uniform resource identifier (URI) is the recommended identifier.
A string that identifies the service being revoked.
